meanings.definition: A person or thing that impacts.
meanings.sent1: The impacter, a heavy hammer, made a loud noise when it hit the metal.
meanings.sent2: The impacter, a strong storm, caused damage to the houses in the area.
meanings.sent3: The impacter, a mischievous squirrel, knocked over the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The impacter, a determined student, made a lasting impression on the teacher.
meanings.sent5: The impacter, a falling rock, created a large crater in the ground.

meanings.definition: To have an effect or influence on something.
meanings.sent1: The loud music impacters my ability to concentrate on my homework.
meanings.sent2: Her encouraging words impactered his decision to pursue his dream.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected rain impacters the outdoor picnic, but everyone enjoyed the impromptu dance party.
meanings.sent4: The new policy impacters the way we schedule our meetings.
meanings.sent5: The positive attitude of the team impacters the overall morale of the office.

meanings.sent1: The car impacters the wall, causing significant damage.
meanings.sent2: The soccer ball impacters the goal post and bounces back into play.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy waiter impacters the table, spilling drinks everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The asteroid impacters the planet, leaving a massive crater.
meanings.sent5: The waves impacters the shore, eroding the coastline over time.
